title: Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for November 2024
description: Today's solution for Wheel of Fortune. The post Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for November 2024 appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Nicholas Tan
excerpt: Here is the answer to the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle today in November 2024, plus the solutions to the other puzzles in the game.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Here you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer throughout the month of November 2024. We’ve also provide the solutions for all the other regular puzzles and toss-ups for today, and update this article on a daily basis. From November 25 to 29, it will be Great Escapes Week, so you can expect a few puzzles that will have special trips and cruises around the world. The game today will include three new contestants: Peggy Smires, Anthony Rogers, and Tristiana Hinton. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for November 25. What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight? The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Monday, November 25, 2024 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode. Bonus Round Puzzle – HEAD COACH [Person] Tossup #1 – CHASING MY DREAMS [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #2 – OCEAN KAYAKING [Fun & Games] Regular Puzzle #1 – SPONTANEOUS ROAD TRIP [Event] Regular Puzzle #2 – EMOTIONAL BAGGAGE HANDLER [Before & After] Regular Puzzle #3 – ROWS OF BEACH UMBRELLAS [Things] Tossup #3 – ASSISTANT [Person] Tossup #4 – HARD WORKER [Person] Tossup #5 – CHIEF EXECUTIVE [Person] Regular Puzzle #4 – PUMPKIN SPICE LATTE [Food & Drink] And here are yesterday’s puzzle answers for Friday, November 22: Bonus Round Puzzle – LAVISH VACATION [Event] Tossup #1 – LET’S GIVE THANKS [Phrases] Tossup #2 – SCORING A TOUCHDOWN [Fun & Games] Regular Puzzle #1 – CORN BREAD STUFFING [Food & Drink] Regular Puzzle #2 – OUTER & PERSONAL SPACE [Same Name] Regular Puzzle #3 – SWAYING PALM TREES [Living Things] Tossup #3 – TURNING ON THE STOVE [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #4 – TURNING ON THE TELEVISION [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #5 – TURNING ON THE CHARM [What Are You Doing?] Regular Puzzle #4 – I REFUSE TO LOSE [Rhyme TIme] The Fan Friday contest by Collette is still active and a new word for the sweepstakes will be posted at some time during the November 29 episode. There’s an upcoming Secret Santa Holiday Giveaway for Wheel Watchers Club members where you can win money and Disney vacations by tuning into the show from December 9 to 20.
html:
Here you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer throughout the month of November 2024. We’ve also provide the solutions for all the other regular puzzles and toss-ups for today, and update this article on a daily basis.

From November 25 to 29, it will be Great Escapes Week, so you can expect a few puzzles that will have special trips and cruises around the world. The game today will include three new contestants: Peggy Smires, Anthony Rogers, and Tristiana Hinton. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for November 25.

What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight?

The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Monday, November 25, 2024 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode.

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – HEAD COACH [Person]
  • Tossup #1 – CHASING MY DREAMS [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #2 – OCEAN KAYAKING [Fun & Games]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – SPONTANEOUS ROAD TRIP [Event]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – EMOTIONAL BAGGAGE HANDLER [Before & After]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – ROWS OF BEACH UMBRELLAS [Things]
  • Tossup #3 – ASSISTANT [Person]
  • Tossup #4 – HARD WORKER [Person]
  • Tossup #5 – CHIEF EXECUTIVE [Person]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – PUMPKIN SPICE LATTE [Food & Drink]

And here are yesterday’s puzzle answers for Friday, November 22:

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – LAVISH VACATION [Event]
  • Tossup #1 – LET’S GIVE THANKS [Phrases]
  • Tossup #2 – SCORING A TOUCHDOWN [Fun & Games]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – CORN BREAD STUFFING [Food & Drink]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – OUTER & PERSONAL SPACE [Same Name]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – SWAYING PALM TREES [Living Things]
  • Tossup #3 – TURNING ON THE STOVE [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #4 – TURNING ON THE TELEVISION [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #5 – TURNING ON THE CHARM [What Are You Doing?]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – I REFUSE TO LOSE [Rhyme TIme]

The Fan Friday contest by Collette is still active and a new word for the sweepstakes will be posted at some time during the November 29 episode. There’s an upcoming Secret Santa Holiday Giveaway for Wheel Watchers Club members where you can win money and Disney vacations by tuning into the show from December 9 to 20.
